post:
Hi there,

I'm not interested in introductions as I don't have much time to waste (I'm sure you don't either) so lets cut the chase .
Our servers are hosted at Worldstream with guaranteed new hardware components not some cheap or second-hand components.

The KVM specs are :
SGPVMXSL-I
1 vcore (Intel(R) Xeon(R) E-2236 CPU @ 3.40GHz)
1630MiB RAM (ECC Registered)
25GiB SSD RAID1 (Datacenter SSDs)
50GiB HDD RAID1 (Enterprise HDDs)
3.5TiB Bandwidth @ 1gbit port speed with 40Gbit DDoS Protection
1 IPv4
1 /64 IPv6
With 35% (Coupon code TLZP0LHD5K) and Annual commitment the final price is 5.85 EUR/Month (Only 2 lucky buyers will get it) hurry up .

More in-depth features and FAQs can be found here
https://www.xsl.tel/hosting/vps/standard-vps

You can install VM using our integrated VNC along with some popular ISOs ready to-mount. or you can use IPXe .
If you have specific ISO we don't offer you will need to ticket us about it and if its legit we will make it available.

Best regards
Mohammed H
Xsltel OU
